com.empire_of_science.joao.coloreaters2

Class GameAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.empire_of_science.joao.coloreaters2.GameAnimation

  • class GameAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jo√£o on 30/09/2016. Has methods that allow the different animations of moving pieces. An object of this class will be a field of the Game View.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) boolean animationOn
      True if the user has the animations turned on
      private int frame
      The animation frame.
      private java.util.List<BoardPiece> movingPieces
      List of pieces that have to be moved during a move animation.
      (package private) boolean needsRedraw
      True if at the next drawing of the GameView it will request another redrawing by calling invalidate().
      (package private) AnimationState state
      The animation currently happening, NoAction if there's no animation going on.
      (package private) GameView view
      Associated GameView.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameAnimation(GameView view)
      The constructor sets the view that has this GameAnimation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void eatingFrame()
      Performs a frame of the pieces moving in the direction of their eater if they have been eaten.
      private void movingFrame()
      Performs a frame of moving the pieces following the user's input.
      (package private) void performAnimationFrame()
      Performs a frame of the appropriate animation.
      (package private) void startAnimation()
      Called when an animation is requested.
      private void terminateEatingAnimation()
      Called at the last frame of eat animation.
      private void terminateMovingAnimation()
      Called during en last frame of moving animation.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • animationOn

        boolean animationOn
        True if the user has the animations turned on

      • view

        GameView view
        Associated GameView.

      • needsRedraw

        boolean needsRedraw
        True if at the next drawing of the GameView it will request another redrawing by calling invalidate().

      • frame

        private int frame
        The animation frame. Always set to 1 at the beginning of the animation.

      • state

        AnimationState state
        The animation currently happening, NoAction if there's no animation going on.

      • movingPieces

        private java.util.List<BoardPiece> movingPieces
        List of pieces that have to be moved during a move animation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameAnimation

        GameAnimation(GameView view)
        The constructor sets the view that has this GameAnimation.
        Parameters:
        view - Associated GameView.

    • Method Detail

      • performAnimationFrame

        void performAnimationFrame()
        Performs a frame of the appropriate animation. If state is moving and the frame is 10, changes to eating animation if there is something to eat, or ends the animation.. If state is eating and the frame is 10, ends the animation.

      • movingFrame

        private void movingFrame()
        Performs a frame of moving the pieces following the user's input.

      • eatingFrame

        private void eatingFrame()
        Performs a frame of the pieces moving in the direction of their eater if they have been eaten.

      • terminateMovingAnimation

        private void terminateMovingAnimation()
        Called during en last frame of moving animation. If there are pieces to eat, starts eating animation, if not simply ends animation.

      • terminateEatingAnimation

        private void terminateEatingAnimation()
        Called at the last frame of eat animation.

      • startAnimation

        void startAnimation()
        Called when an animation is requested. If a piece has graphics coordinates that are not the right ones for their board coordinates, the piece's deltaX and deltaY are set and the piece is added to movingPieces. Also the state is changed to Moving and the view is requested to invalidate.
